page.title: 12Baggeridge Country Park (2)
page.content: The{park}was{opened}on{17th June 1983 by{HRH Princess Anne,}an occasion marked by a{plaque}at the{car park. There is{no admission fee}and cars only{pay 20p}for a{whole}day.There are also{picnic tables}and{toilet facilities.Throughout the park there are{15 way markers,}each having a {reference number}and a{series}of {coloured bands. There is a{model boat club}on{Bag {Pool}and a{model car track. A{visitors centre}was{opened}in {October 1984}and includes{displays}of {development}of the park and the {wildlife}to be found within it.The {phone number}of the{centre}is{2605. The{main entrance}is in{Gospel End {Road}and through the park you have {access}to{Himley.
